system.availability: 30cm metal rod that can telescopically extend up to 4 metres on pressing an activation button. Given reliable anchors it can hold 150kg without bending or stress. Good Craftsmanship: 5m, 175kg, Best: 6m, 200kg. In 30cm form, can be Melee Weapon
